title: Thunderbird opens a new window when clicking between tabs
content:
I've just moved to Thunderbird from another email client. I'm pretty happy with it so far except for the fact that when the Mail tab is open along with Settings and/or Addons and I click between them a new window suddenly pops out. It's like I've just dragged one of the tabs to the desktop to open a new window, except I haven't, I've merely clicked one of the 2 or 3 tabs. After adjusting a setting or two, or adding a new theme etc it gets a little tiring having to close these unwanted windows. Any idea what might be causing this and how I can prevent it?

- In Settings > General I tried switching between the 3 options in "Open messages in..." but that had no effect. - TB 115.5.1 - Mac OS 13.6 - 2 addons are installed but I've disabled them.
creator: gh108

title: Thunderbird won't get mail

title: email folder

title: Thunderbird email client error
content:
Thunderbird email client error while downloading emails.

Configured MS Office 365 F3 account with POP3/SMTP protocol.

Error is: RETR command did not succeed. error retrieving the message. Server unavailable 21

Unable to download emails after the error.

The error is randomly happening for many users. At least 100 users are getting affected out of 1000 thunderbird users with Office 365 F3 plan configured with POP3/SMTP.
creator: chowdhuryj

title: Spam/Junk email list
content: I had emptied my spam and junk folders but unfortunately I had marked up one email address as such which I need to undue, but I can't find where the list is. Where do I find it please?

title: Lines that link threads not showing
content: Hello, I recently stopped having the lines that link every email in a thread. I think it's easier to see in the photos. The one with dark background is with the missing lines while the one with light background is showing the lines. Is there a way to turn the lines back on? Thanks,
creator: xgirbo

title: emails
content:
Hello

Two people have tried to send me emails recently, and have have received the following message:

Mail Delivery Subsystem <mailer-daemon@googlemail.com>

to me

Address not found Your message wasn't delivered to colin.jannaway@tiscali.co.uk because the address couldn't be found or is unable to receive email.

The response from the remote server was: 550 5.1.0 AVVGr6CpU6W8m Too Many Invalid Recipients (TT405)

I have received other emails without problem. Is there something I can do to solve this problem, please?

Many thanks.

Colin
creator: colin.jannaway
